page.title: 16People
page.content: Other than a few farms and the small villages of Fyfield and Tubney most people live in Kingston Bagpuize whose population according to our survey is 1650 -649 men,684 women,317 children. There is a large number of senior citizens-152,who are attracted to the village by suitable housing(there are many bungalows on the estates) amenities and transport.145 of the children attend John Blandy School. According to the A.A. handbook the population in 1958 was 191. Most people work outside the village travelling to Oxford,Witney,Abingdon or Swindon.Some of the local employment opportunities are in farming,retailing, a bonded warehouse,a large garage and o two sites,one in Kingston,one in Fyfield,where several small specialist concerns have set up workshops.
